title: Fireside with the Underboss - "He Pulled a Gun From a Secret Compartment in His Camera"
description: During the second Colombo war, Sammy gets assigned to whack Crazy Joe Gallo. Before he can even get close to Joe, Sammy realizes he's surrounded by made guys and tons of weapons.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: During the second Colombo war, Sammy gets assigned to whack Crazy Joe Gallo. Before he can even get close to Joe, Sammy realizes he's surrounded by made guys and tons of weapons.
